attributes.action: Help Stop the annual Killing of Dolphins and whales in Japan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Japan kills over 20,000 dolphins and small whales annually, most of which wind up in meat markets \nd more end up in aquariums. A dead dolphin sells for about US$600 on the market for meat and a Live one for thousands of dollars!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
